summary: Probability, inference, and hypothesis testing; labs in R.

specifics: Built parsers with ANTLR; visitor pattern over ASTs

title: COMP 321 – Introduction to Computer Systems

specifics: Built Unix shell, threading libs, custom malloc, checkpointing, and KV store

title: CS430 – Data Mining

title: EP430 – Computer Architecture
